description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for the API endpoints related to 'Hello World' message and employee management (create, list, replace, patch, delete). It also contains Swagger documentation for API generation and documentation.

methods.name: router.get('/hello')
methods.description: Handles GET request for the '/hello' endpoint, responds with 'Hello World'.

methods.name: router.post('/employees')
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new employee record, delegates to employeesController.create.

methods.name: router.get('/employees')
methods.description: Handles GET request to list all employee records, delegates to employeesController.list.

methods.name: router.put('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handles PUT request to replace an employee record, delegates to employeesController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handles PATCH request to partially update an employee record, delegates to employeesController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete an employee record, delegates to employeesController.delete.
